Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers I
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers II
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers III
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers IV
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers V
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS BENZ Reagent, calibrator kits and performance verifiers for semi-quantitative or qualitative determination of benzodiazepines and other drugs of abuse in human urine using automated clinical chemistry analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use to semi-quantitatively or qualitatively determine benzodiazepines in human urine, aiding in diagnosis and treatment of benzodiazepine use or overdose, and for calibration and performance monitoring of urine drugs of abuse assays on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry Systems
